title: Settings
description:
Base class for settings, allowing values to be overridden by environment variables. This is useful in production for secrets you do not wish to save in code, it plays nicely with docker(-compose),
Heroku and any 12 factor app design.

HOST.title: Host
HOST.description: Host address(including port) of the frontend app

FIRST_ADMIN_EMAIL.title: First Admin Email
FIRST_ADMIN_EMAIL.description: email address of the 1. admin user

EMAIL_ENABLED.title: Email Enabled
EMAIL_ENABLED.description: Set if emails should be sent

EMAIL_SENDER.title: Email Sender
EMAIL_SENDER.description: (REQUIRED, when EMAIL_ENABLED):  Name of the sender, including the server

EMAIL_ACCOUNT.title: Email Account
EMAIL_ACCOUNT.description: (REQUIRED, when EMAIL_ENABLED): Email address of the sender

EMAIL_PWD.title: Email Pwd
EMAIL_PWD.description: (REQUIRED, when EMAIL_ENABLED): Password of the email  account

EMAIL_SSL_SERVER.title: Email Ssl Server
EMAIL_SSL_SERVER.description: (REQUIRED, when EMAIL_ENABLED): smtp-server of email account

SESSION_SECRET.title: Session Secret
SESSION_SECRET.description: A generic secret to be used for session encryption

MAP_DEFAULT_MAP_STYLE.title: Map Default Map Style
MAP_DEFAULT_MAP_STYLE.description: Default mapbox map style to render maps. This is the default style to use. More info: mapbox.com/

PLATFORM_TITLE.title: Platform Title
PLATFORM_TITLE.description: The title of the platform. Visible on the appbar, when no-domain

APP_DIR.title: App Dir
APP_DIR.description: The directory where the frontend-app is located, relatively to the app path (default: fe)

APP_ROUTE.title: App Route
APP_ROUTE.description: application path the frontend app is hooked to.

BASE_DATA_FOLDER.title: Base Data Folder
BASE_DATA_FOLDER.description: Base data folder, where application files (not static files) are stored

INIT_DOMAINS_SUBPATH.title: Init Domains Subpath
INIT_DOMAINS_SUBPATH.description: Sub-path to the folder where the initial domains are stored, within BASE_DATA_FOLDER/init_files/

INIT_DOMAINS.title: Init Domains
INIT_DOMAINS.description: Configuration, if domains should be re-initialized during startup

INIT_TEMPLATES_CODES.title: Init Templates Codes
INIT_TEMPLATES_CODES.description: Configuration, if templates and code entries should be re-initialized during startup

INIT_LANGUAGE_TABLES.title: Init Language Tables
INIT_LANGUAGE_TABLES.description: Configuration, if language tables should be re-initialized during startup

REPLACE_MESSAGES.title: Replace Messages
REPLACE_MESSAGES.description: Configuration, if messages during re-initialization should be overwritten by text in csv files

LOGIN_REQUIRED.title: Login Required
LOGIN_REQUIRED.description: Configuration, if login is required for all routes (experimental)

EMAIL_VERIFICATION_REQUIRED.title: Email Verification Required
EMAIL_VERIFICATION_REQUIRED.description: Configuration, if email verification is required after registration

TIMING_MIDDLEWARE_ACTIVE.title: Timing Middleware Active
TIMING_MIDDLEWARE_ACTIVE.description: Configuration, if timing middleware should be active

DATA_MIGRATION.title: Data Migration
DATA_MIGRATION.description: Configuration, if data migration should be performed after setup

RUN_APP_TESTS.title: Run App Tests
RUN_APP_TESTS.description: Configuration, if app tests should be run after setup

LANGUAGE_LIST_SOURCE_REPO_URL.title: Language List Source Repo Url
LANGUAGE_LIST_SOURCE_REPO_URL.description: Repo from which language names are taken (downloaded at the first startup)

MIGRATION_HELP_ACTIVE.title: Migration Help Active
MIGRATION_HELP_ACTIVE.description: change some config helping and adaptations to the init code for migration

RESET_TEST_DB.title: Reset Test Db
RESET_TEST_DB.description: Completely clear the db at startup. Only works in test env

DEFAULT_LANGUAGE_FE_MESSAGES_FILE.title: Default Language Fe Messages File
DEFAULT_LANGUAGE_FE_MESSAGES_FILE.description: A i18n source file that is generally stored in the frontend development repo (works only in dev mode)
